title: 'Escape' League of Legends Montage | RektboiHD

embed.description: This short Montage just shows visual effects. Leave a Comment if you have any questions. ======================== Song : Ellusive - Escape ( feat.

body:
My newest Montage is online. It only shows visual effects and not spectacular gameplay.

If you enjoy the montage feel free to like and subscribe.

If you have any questions dont mind asking me. Have a nice day :)

replies.body: You could use a better song m8.

replies.poster: x A N D R E
replies.body: What program did u use for this video?
Skinsspotlight Camera, After Effects and Sony Vegas
